mapper.insert: INSERT /* Query ID=hae.basic.service.dao.BasicSampleMDAO.insertSample */ INTO BASIC ( SEQ , CATEGORY , TITLE , DESCRIPTION , REG_USER , REG_DATE , VIEW_COUNT ) VALUES ( 3 , #{category} , #{title} , #{description} , #{regUser} , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') , 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT /* Query ID=hae.basic.service.dao.BasicSampleMDAO.selectSample */ SEQ , CATEGORY , TITLE , DESCRIPTION , REG_USER , REG_DATE FROM BASIC WHERE SEQ = #{seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE /* Query ID=hae.basic.service.dao.BasicSampleMDAO.updateSampleViewCount */ BASIC SET VIEW_COUNT = VIEW_COUNT+1 WHERE SEQ = #{seq}
mapper.select:
SELECT /* Query ID=hae.basic.service.dao.BasicSampleMDAO.selectSampleList */ SEQ , CATEGORY , TITLE , REG_USER , REG_DATE , VIEW_COUNT FROM BASIC WHERE 1=1
AND CATEGORY LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND REG_USER LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY SEQ DESC
